casebody.data:
In the MATTER OF Anthony F. SARSANO, an Attorney at Law (Attorney No. 011331974) 082024
D-34 September Term 2018 Supreme Court of New Jersey. JUNE 3, 2019

ORDER

The Disciplinary Review Board having filed with the Court its decision in DRB 18-154, that Anthony F. Sarsano of Union City, who was admitted to the bar of this State in 1974, should be reprimanded for violating RPC 1.7(a)(2) (concurrent conflict of interest), and good cause appearing;

It is ORDERED that Anthony F. Sarsano is hereby reprimanded; and it is further

ORDERED that the entire record of this matter be made a permanent part of respondent's file as an attorney at law of this State; and it is further

ORDERED that respondent reimburse the Disciplinary Oversight Committee for appropriate administrative costs and actual expenses incurred in the prosecution of this matter, as provided in Rule 1:20-17.
